body_html: I found that most of ops use ops.convert_to_tensor to convert its inputs, however the method is really strict (same dimension, same dtype etc), and brings some inconvenience, for example #12486. Is it possible to find a more general and solid solution? say, create some more loose helper method?

body: I found that most of ops use `ops.convert_to_tensor` to convert its inputs, however the method is really strict (same dimension, same dtype etc), and brings some inconvenience, for example #12486. Is it possible to find a more general and solid solution? say, create some more loose helper method?
